titles.title: Protecting the Independent Funding of the Office of Financial Research Act
To amend the Financial Stability Act of 2010 to preserve the independent funding of the Office of Financial Research.
Protecting the Independent Funding of the Office of Financial Research Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Protecting the Independent Funding of the Office of Financial Research Act
This bill gives the Director of the Office of Financial Research (OFR) within the Department of the Treasury sole discretion over the OFR's annual budget, which shall in any given year be not less than the OFR's FY2017 budget.
